name: LoopYear
description:
Awaken, Seedling. You have been given a sacred task. Find and awaken the spirit that lives deep within this elder tree. Your journey is perilous; you have been burdened by the curse that afflicts this land. Chained by time itself, you have but moments to find your quarry. Make precious use of that time; solve puzzles, find shortcuts, learn from past mistakes. Go, little one. Your time has already begun to run out.

CONTROLS:

- Move: WASD/Arrow Keys

- Jump: Space

- Reset Time Loop: R

- Interact: E/Left Ctrl
